mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (md_id, member_id, review_title, review_content, review_date, review_star) VALUES(#{md_id}, #{member_id}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, now(), #{review_star})

select count(review_id) cnt from review where md_id = #{md_id}
